name: Faizz Mega World (Public Beta)
description:
'My heavy edit/mod/alteration  version of Rockman 7 FC, originally a Mega Man fan game.'

It's been 6 times Faizz beat the crap out of Dr Wily but, that aged scientist never dies. So Faizz throw him into the prison and guess what? He escaped!

HOW TO PLAY:

ARROW KEYS:  MAKE THAT BAD BOY MOVE

Z : JUMP        X : FIRE/ATTACK

A and S : SWAP WEAPONS

Basically, the controls are very familiar for NES emulator players.  

And one last thing, just don't get hit by bunch of sh*t in this game.

MORE INFORMATION IN THE INCLUDED MANUAL !
